entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,1,1,1}{F813,0,219002}I hear Kenji's somewhere in here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219003}In my dream, it was this giant room,{F801}kinda like a dome...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,1,1,1}{F813,0,219002}I hear Kenji's somewhere in here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219003}In my dream, it was this giant room,{F801}kinda like a dome...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,12,1,1}{F813,0,219005}If Kenji dies, I'll finally be King{F801}of Tokyo...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,12,1,1}{F813,0,219005}If Kenji dies, I'll finally be King{F801}of Tokyo...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,219006}Akira, I'm curious. What do you plan{F801}on doing once you become king...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,219006}Akira, I'm curious. What do you plan{F801}on doing once you become king...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,1,1,1}{F813,0,219008}Rules have never been my thing.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219009}Frankly, I wanna make Tokyo a place{F801}where we can all be equal.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,1,1,1}{F813,0,219008}Rules have never been my thing.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219009}Frankly, I wanna make Tokyo a place{F801}where we can all be equal.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,219010}You mean to have the strong and weak{F801}both be treated alike?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219011}Is that truly equality?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,219010}You mean to have the strong and weak{F801}both be treated alike?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219011}Is that truly equality?{F801}

entry.source: "It is strange."{F801}"It's not strange at all."{F801}
entry.target: "It is strange."{F801}"It's not strange at all."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,219014}You have my respect for your stance.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219015}Your concern for the well-being of the{F801}people over your own selfishness is{F801}the mark of a true king.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,219014}You have my respect for your stance.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219015}Your concern for the well-being of the{F801}people over your own selfishness is{F801}the mark of a true king.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,4,1,1}{F813,0,219016}I wish you the best, King Akira...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,4,1,1}{F813,0,219016}I wish you the best, King Akira...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,6,1,1}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,219018}I can't say I agree...{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,219019}But every man is entitled to his own{F801}opinion.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,6,1,1}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,219018}I can't say I agree...{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,219019}But every man is entitled to his own{F801}opinion.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,219020}You're staking your own life for the{F801}benefit of others, yes?{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,219021}Then you'll need to be stronger...{F801}King Akira.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,219020}You're staking your own life for the{F801}benefit of others, yes?{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,219021}Then you'll need to be stronger...{F801}King Akira.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,12,1,1}{F813,0,219022}...Alright, enough small talk.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219024}The rest is up to you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,12,1,1}{F813,0,219022}...Alright, enough small talk.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,219024}The rest is up to you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Akira walked away.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Akira walked away.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F813,1,401702}Uh... well, this IS northwest of{F801}Kasumigaseki, but... this is Camp{F801}Ichigaya.{F801}{F802}Shinjuku's more to the west. Listen,{F801}because it's important: you gotta go{F801}further west.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F813,1,401702}Uh... well, this IS northwest of{F801}Kasumigaseki, but... this is Camp{F801}Ichigaya.{F801}{F802}Shinjuku's more to the west. Listen,{F801}because it's important: you gotta go{F801}further west.{F801}
